Verses: 1 karththar Egipthu Dhesaththil Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki:
2 indha Maadham Ungalukkup Piradhaana Maadham; Idhu Ungalukku Varushaththin Mudhalaam Maadhamaai Iruppadhaaga.
3 neengal Isravel Sabaiyaar Yaavaraiyum Nokki: Indha Maadham Paththaam Thedhiyil Veettuth Thalaivargal, Veettukku Oru Aattukkuttiyaaga, Ovvoruvarum Ovvoru Aattukkuttiyaith Therindhukollakkadavargal.

4 oru Veettil Irukkiravargal Oru Aattukkuttiyaip Pusikkiradharkup Podhumaana Pergalaayiraamal Ponaal, Avanum Avan Sameebaththilirukkira Ayal Veettukkaaranum, Thangalidaththilulla Aaththumaakkalin Ilakkaththirkuth Thakkadhaaka Oru Aattukkuttiyaith Therindhukollavendum; Avanavan Pusippukkuth Thakkadhaaga Ilakkam Paarththu, Aattukkuttiyaith Therindhukollavendum.
5 andha Aattukkutti Pazhudhatradhum Aanum Oru Vayadhulladhumaai Irukka Vendum; Semmariyaadugalilaavadhu Vellaadugalilaavadhu Adhaith Therindhukollalaam.
6 adhai Indha Maadham Padhinaalaam Thedhi Varaikkum Vaiththirundhu, Isravel Sabaiyin Ovvoru Koottaththaarum Saayangaalaththil Adhai Adiththu,
7 adhin Iraththaththil Konjam Eduththu, Thaangal Adhaip Pusikkum Veettuvaasal Nilaikkaalgal Irandilum Nilaiyin Mersattaththilum Theliththu,
8 andru Raaththiriyile Adhin Maamsaththai Neruppinaal Suttu, Pulippillaa Appaththodum Kasappaana Keeraiyodum Adhaip Pusikkakkadavargal.
9 pachchaiyaayum Thanneeril Avikkappattadhaayum Alla; Adhin Thalaiyaiyum Adhin Thodaigalaiyum Adharkulla Yaavaiyum Egamaai Neruppinaal Suttadhaai Adhaip Pusippeergalaaga.
10 adhile Ondraiyum Vidiyarkaalam Mattum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkaamal, Vidiyarkaalammattum Adhile Meedhiyaai Irukkiradhai Akkiniyaal Sutterippeergalaaga.

11 adhaip Pusikka Vendiya Vidhamaavadhu, Neengal Ungal Araigalil Kachchai Kattikkondum, Ungal Kaalgalil Paadharatchai Thoduththukkondum, Ungal Kaiyil Thadi Pidiththukkondum Adhaith Theeviramaai Pusikkakkadaveergal; Adhu Karththarudaiya Paskaa.

12 andha Raaththiriyile Naan Egipthudhesamengum Kadandhupoi, Egipthu Thesaththilulla Manidharmudhal Mirugajeevangalmattum, Mudhalperaayirukkiravaigalaiyellaam Adhampanni, Egipthu Dhevargalinmel Needhiyaich Seluththuven; Naane Karththar.

13 neengal Irukkum Veedugalil Andha Iraththam Ungalukkaaga Adaiyaalamaai Irukkum; Andha Iraththaththai Naan Kandu, Ungalaik Kadandhupoven; Naan Egipthudhesaththai Azhikkumpodhu, Azhikkum Vaadhai Ungalukkulle Varaadhirukkum.

14 andha Naal Ungalukku Ninaivukoorudhalaana Naalaai Irukkakkadavadhu; Adhaik Karththarukkup Pandigaiyaaga Aasarippeergalaaga; Adhai Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Niththiya Niyamamaaga Aasarikkakkadaveergal.

15 pulippillaa Appaththai Ezhu Naalalavum Pusikkakkadaveergal; Mudhalaam Naalildhaane Puliththa Maavai Ungal Veedugalilirundhu Neekkavendum; Mudhalaam Naal Thodangi Ezhaam Naal Varaikkum Puliththaappam Pusikkiravan Evano Andha Aaththumaa Isravelarilirundhu Aruppundu Povaan.

16 mudhalaam Naalil Parisuththa Sabai Koodudhalum, Ezhaam Naalilum Parisuththasapai Koodudhalum Irukkavendum; Avaigalil Oru Velaiyum Seyyappadalaagaadhu; Avaravar Saappidugiradharkuth Thevaiyaanadhu Maaththiram Ungalaal Seyyappadalaam.

17 pulippillaa Appap Pandigaiyai Aasarippeergalaaga; Indha Naalildhaan Naan Ungal Senaigalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadap Panninen; Aagaiyaal, Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Niththiya Niyamamaaga Indha Naalai Aasarikkakkadaveergal.
18 mudhalaam Maadham Padhinaalaam Thedhi Saayangaalam Thodangi Maadhaththin Iruvaththoraam Thedhi Saayangaalam Varaikkum Pulippillaa Appam Pusikkakkadaveergal.

19 ezhu Naalalavum Ungal Veedugalil Puliththa Maa Kaanappatalaagaadhu; Evanaagilum Pulippilappattathaip Pusiththaal, Avan Paradhesiyaanaalum Sudhesiyaanaalum, Andha Aaththumaa Isravel Sabaiyil Iraamal Aruppundu Povaan.
20 pulippitappatta Yaadhondraiyum Neengal Pusikkaventaam; Ungal Vaasasdhalangalilellaam Pulippillaa Appam Pusikkakkataveerkal Endru Sol Endraar.
21 appozhudhu Mose Isravel Mooppar Yaavaraiyum Azhaippiththu: Neengal Ungal Kudumpangalukkuth Thakkadhaaga Ungalukku Aattukkuttiyaith Therindheduththukkondu, Paskaavai Adiththu,

22 eesoppuk Kozhundhugalin Koththai Eduththu Kinniyil Irukkum Iraththaththil Thoiththu, Adhil Irukkum Andha Iraththaththai Vaasal Nilaikkaalgalin Mersattaththilum Vaasalin Nilaikkaalgal Irandilum Theliyungal; Vidiyarkaalam Varaikkum Ungalil Oruvarum Veettu Vaasalai Vittup Purappadavendaam.

23 karththar Egipthiyarai Adhampannugiradharkuk Kadandhuvaruvaar; Nilaiyin Mersattaththilum Vaasalin Nilaikkaalgal Irandilum Andha Iraththaththaik Kaanumpodhu, Karththar Sangaarakkaaranai Ungal Veedugalil Ungalai Adhampannugiradharku Varavottaamal, Vaasalpadiyai Vilakik Kadandhupovaar.
24 indhak Kaariyaththai Ungalukkum Ungal Pillaigalukkum Niththiya Niyamamaagak Kaikkollakkadaveergal.
25 karththar Ungalukkuth Thaam Sonnabadi Kodukkappogira Dhesaththile Neengal Poich Serumbodhu, Indha Aaraadhanaiyaik Kaikkollakkadaveergal.
26 appozhudhu Ungal Pillaigal: Indha Aaraadhanaiyin Karuththu Enna Endru Ungalaik Kettaal,

27 idhu Karththarudaiya Paskaavaagiya Bali; Avar Egipthiyarai Adhampanni, Nammudaiya Veedugalaith Thappappanninapodhu, Egipthilirundha Isravel Puththirarudaiya Veedugalaik Kadandhuponaar Endru Neengal Sollavendum Endraan. Appozhudhu Janangal Thalaivanangip Panindhukondaargal.
28 isravel Puththirar Poi Appadiye Seydhaargal; Karththar Mosekkum Aaronukkum Kattalaiyittapadiye Seydhaargal.

29 naduraaththiriyile Singaasanaththin Mel Veetrirukkum Paarvonudaiya Thalaippillai Mudhal Kaaval Kitangilirukkum Siraippattavanin Thalaippillai Varaikkum, Egipthu Dhesaththil Irundha Mudhalperanaiththaiyum Mirugajeevangalin Thalaiyeetranaiththaiyum Karththar Azhiththaar.
30 appozhudhu Paarvonum Avanudaiya Sagala Oozhiyakkaararum Egipthiyar Yaavarum Iraaththiriyile Ezhundhirundhaargal; Magaa Kookkural Egipthile Undaayitru; Saavillaadha Oru Veedum Irundhadhillai.
31 iraaththiriyile Avan Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Azhaippiththu: Neengalum Isravel Puththirarum Ezhundhu, En Janangalaivittup, Purappattuppoi, Neengal Sonnabadiye Karththarukku Aaraadhanaiseyyungal.
32 neengal Sonnabadiye Ungal Aadumaadugalaiyum Ottikkondupongal; Ennaiyum Aaseervadhiyungal Endraan.
33 egipthiyar: Naangal Ellaarum Saagirome Endru Solli, Theeviramaai Andha Janangalaith Dhesaththilirundhu Anuppivida Avargalai Migavum Thuridhappaduththinaargal.
34 pisaindhamaa Pulikkumun Janangal Adhaip Paaththiraththudane Thangal Vasthirangalil Katti, Thangal Tholmel Eduththukkondu Ponaargal.
35 mose Solliyirundhabadi Isravel Janangal Egipthiyaridaththil Velliyudaimaigalaiyum Ponnudaimaigalaiyum Vasthirangalaiyum Kettaargal.
36 karththar Janangalukku Egipthiyarin Kangalil Dhayavu Kidaikkumbadi Seydhadhinaal, Kettadhai Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal; Ivvidhamaai Avargal Egipthiyaraik Kollaiyittaargal.
37 isravel Puththirar Raamasesai Vittuk Kaalnadaiyaaip Pirayaanam Panni, Sukkoththukkup Ponaargal; Avargal, Pillaigalthavira Aarulatcham Purusharaayirundhaargal.
38 avargalodekoodap Pala Jaadhiyaana Janangal Anegar Ponadhum Andri, Migudhiyaana Aadumaadugal Mudhalaana Mirugajeevangalum Poyitru.

39 egipthilirundhu Avargal Konduvandha Pisaindhamaavaip Pulippillaa Appangalaagach Suttaargal; Avargal Egipthil Tharikkak Koodaamal Thuraththividappattadhinaal, Adhu Puliyaadhirundhadhu; Avargal Thangalukku Vazhikkendru Ondrum Aayaththampannavillai.
40 isravel Puththirar Egipthile Kudiyirundha Kaalam Naanootrumuppadhu Varusham.
41 naanootrumuppadhu Varusham Mudindha Andraithdhiname Karththarudaiya Senaigal Ellaam Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappattadhu.

42 karththar Avargalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninadhinaal, Idhu Avarukkendru Mukkiyamaai Aasarikkaththakka Raaththiriyaayitru; Isravel Sandhadhiyaar Ellaarum Thangal Thalaimuraidhorum Karththarukku Mukkiyamaai Aasarikkavendiya Raaththiri Idhuve.
43 melum, Karththar Moseyaiyum Aaronaiyum Nokki: Paskaavin Niyamamaavadhu, Anniya Puththiran Oruvanum Adhaip Pusikkavendaam.
44 panaththinaal Kollappatta Adimaiyaanavan Evanum, Nee Avanukku Viruththasedhanampanninapin, Avan Adhaip Pusikkalaam.
45 anniyanum Kooliyaalum Adhile Pusikkavendaam.
46 adhai Ovvoru Veettirkullum Pusikkavendum; Andha Maamsaththil Konjamaagilum Veettilirundhu Veliye Kondupogak Koodaadhu; Adhil Oru Elumbaiyum Murikkak Koodaadhu.
47 isravel Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Adhai Aasarikkakkadavargal.

48 anniyan Oruvan Unnidaththile Thangi, Karththarukkup Paskaavai Aasarikka Vendumendru Irundhaal, Avanaich Serndha Aanpillaigal Yaavarum Viruththasedhanampannappadavendum; Pinbu Avan Serndhu Adhai Aasarikkavendum; Avan Sudhesiyaippol Iruppaan; Viruththasedhanam Illaadha Oruvanum Adhil Pusikkavendaam.
49 sudhesikkum Ungalidaththil Thangum Paradhesikkum Ore Piramaanam Irukkakkadavadhu Endraar.
50 ippadiye Isravel Puththirar Ellaarum Seydhaargal; Karththar Mosekkum Aaronukkum Kattalaiyittapadiye Seydhaargal.
51 andraithdhiname Karththar Isravel Puththirarai Aniyaniyaai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninaar.
